bibl.title: Mélanges de numismatique offerts à Pierre Bastien à l'occasion de son 75e anniversaire
bibl.note: The use of the "Victoria" theme at Rome and the "Nike" issues of Alexandria. The type has reference to events of empire-wide significance.
bibl.seg: Casey John, The Coinage of Alexandria and the Chronology of Hadrian.
Hélène Huvelin, Michel Christol et Georges Gautier (Edd.), Mélanges de numismatique offerts à Pierre Bastien à l'occasion de son 75e anniversaire (Wetteren, 1987) pp. 65-72, 2 tabl. et pl. 5.
The use of the "Victoria" theme at Rome and the "Nike" issues of Alexandria. The type has reference to events of empire-wide significance.
